DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Risk Factors Unipolar Depression Patients Without Remission After One Antidepressant Trial
DOC.detailed_description: A non interventional , descriptive , longitudinal cohort study design , try obtain local data prevalence non remit depressed patient antidepressant treatment , get information sociodemographic clinical characteristic patient well feature treatment compare patient achieve remission . DOC.criteria: Female male age 18 75 year old . Outpatients current episode nonpsychotic unipolar major depression accord DSM IVTR . Severity illness assess mean score ≥ 14 HAM D17 Have medicate current depression episode antidepressant Provision subject inform consent Patients participate clinical trial , subject take part study . The individual participate last 3 month ( include study ) participate clinical trial .
